meanings.definition: The quality or state of being definite.
meanings.sent1: The definiteness of his answer left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent2: The definiteness of the instructions made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent3: Her definiteness in choosing the movie surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The definiteness of the deadline was like a ticking clock.
meanings.sent5: The definiteness of the map helped us find our way easily.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being clear or certain.
meanings.sent1: The definiteness of the rules made it clear what was allowed.
meanings.sent2: The definiteness of her decision put everyone at ease.
meanings.sent3: His definiteness in choosing the dessert was comical.
meanings.sent4: The definiteness of the answer shone like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The definiteness of the plan gave us confidence in its success.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unmistakable.
meanings.sent1: The definiteness of the signal made it easy to find the location.
meanings.sent2: The definiteness of her voice made it unmistakable who was speaking.
meanings.sent3: The definiteness of the smell led us straight to the bakery.
meanings.sent4: The definiteness of the warning sign was like a red flag waving.
meanings.sent5: The definiteness of the footprints left no doubt about the culprit.
